name: Frontier Galaxy
overview: FRONTIER GALAXY... A world we have never experienced awaits us in the darkened depths of space. It is a galaxy of terror and despair, a galaxy of outlaws and dangers unimagined. For this is Frontier Galaxy, a mere numerical notation on maps of the spheres. Hideous alien beings in UFOs... Floating debris which could shatter the hull of your ship. These are some of the deadly perils which will be presented.
